chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 2
chunks.text:
2. This Act shall come into operation on the day on which it receives the
Royal Assent.*1*
INCOME  TAX  (MINING  WITHHOLDING  TAX)  ACT  1979 No. 28 of 1979

chunks.title: Section 3 - Interpretation
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 3
chunks.text:
3. In this Act, ''Assessment Act'' means the Income Tax Assessment Act
1936.
INCOME  TAX  (MINING  WITHHOLDING  TAX)  ACT  1979 No. 28 of 1979

chunks.title: Section 4 - Incorporation
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 4
chunks.text:
4. The Assessment Act is incorporated and shall be read as one with this
Act.
INCOME  TAX  (MINING  WITHHOLDING  TAX)  ACT  1979 No. 28 of 1979

chunks.title: Section 5 - Imposition of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 5
chunks.text:
5. The tax known as income tax, to the extent that it is payable in
accordance with section 128V of the Assessment Act, is imposed, and shall be
levied and paid.
INCOME  TAX  (MINING  WITHHOLDING  TAX)  ACT  1979 No. 28 of 1979

chunks.title: Section 6 - Rate of tax
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 6
chunks.text:
6. The rate of income tax imposed by this Act is 6.4%.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------
--
INCOME  TAX  (MINING  WITHHOLDING  TAX)  ACT  1979 No. 28 of 1979 - NOTE
                                      NOTE
Section 1. Act No. 28, 1979; assented to 4 June 1979.

chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title.
chunks.structure_path: Income Tax (Mining Withholding Tax) Act 1979 > Section 1
